init.purpose: Check if user exists for email/phone to determine login vs register

login.purpose: Authenticate user with username and password

social.purpose: Authenticate or register via OAuth provider

register.purpose: Register new user with email and password

resetotp.purpose: Request OTP reset for password reset

broadcasting.purpose: Get broadcasting auth payload for user

get.purpose: Get single project by UUID (owner or editor)

getPublicProject.purpose: Get public project by UUID with match and application

calculateMatchScore.purpose: Calculate match score between user and project

custom.SentryStatusCodeMiddleware: Captures 5xx responses and sends to Sentry; excludes N+1 query errors

jobs.purpose: Refresh user creator stats (e.g. YouTube followers) using quota

AuthService.responsibility: Authentication: search user by identifier, login, social OAuth, register, OTP, verify, reset password, get chat token

key_methods.name: search
key_methods.description: Find user by email or phone

key_methods.name: social
key_methods.description: Authenticate or register via OAuth (google, facebook, linkedin)

key_methods.name: register
key_methods.description: Create user and send verification OTP

key_methods.name: otp
key_methods.description: Generate/send OTP and optionally send reset email

key_methods.name: verify
key_methods.description: Verify OTP and optionally set email_verified_at and active

key_methods.name: resetPassword
key_methods.description: Reset user password after OTP verify

key_methods.name: getChatToken
key_methods.description: Create GetStream chat token for user

ProjectService.responsibility: Project CRUD, public jobs, status/workflow, milestones, deposit/purchase, review/feedback, match calculation, alerts

auth.authentication_requirements: None for init/login/register/otp; Bearer for logout/password/broadcasting/chat

matching.authentication_requirements: Bearer for protected; none for public-matching and get by token

project.authentication_requirements: Bearer for most; none for no-auth public and metadata

user.authentication_requirements: Bearer for /user/{id}; none for referral and notifications

public.authentication_requirements: None or webhook signatures (Stripe, SendGrid, Webflow)

editor.authentication_requirements: None for public editor views; optional for admin
